member.name: MIBICMPINFO
member.summary: TheMIBICMPINFO structure contains Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) statistics for a particular computer.

member.name: MIBICMPINFO.icmpInStats
member.summary: An structure that contains the statistics for incoming ICMP messages.

member.name: MIBICMPINFO.icmpOutStats
member.summary: An structure that contains the statistics for outgoing ICMP messages.
